The crafty Zoroark’s eyes lit up when he saw her and knew that with the right help she could get even bigger.

The late twenties-year-old manager grinned as the ever growing and widening Nidoqueen game into his office. “They're my most hardworking employee! Well, how was today’s batch of food? Good, great, could be better?” Henry asked with a genial smile, watching as the hedonistic Pokemon walked towards his desk. Her massive breasts jiggled in unison with her stomach on display for the world to see, her monumental thunder thighs and rump grinding against each other. Pamela sat her colossal ass down onto the chair in front of his desk.

Henry knew that hiring Pamela was a bad idea. He wasn't oblivious to the fact that the store’s profit has plummeted as Pamela’s food intake soared. He knew she was hated by the others for how much special treatment she got. He just didn’t care. He wasn't thinking with his heart or mind most days anymore. As of late, every decision he made for the store revolved around the object of his desire.

“Naww, thank you, boss! Let me think…” giggled the Nidoqueen coyly. “I beat my personal record today! I cleared out the entire store before my lunch break, not after. They were all really good like always, but lately, I feel like the chefs have been a little skimpy making them. I mean just look, I’m wasting away!” The Nidoqueen lifted up her painted on the shirt to reveal her titanic tummy even more as it jutted out from her torso. She put both paws on either side and squished it, making it even more pronounced to the Zoroark.

“Well now…” Henry drooled at the sight of so much lard, so soft and wobbly. “It seems to me that you’ve been putting a lot of initiative into your job! Keep this up, and you’ll go far here! I think this warrants celebration!”

“More food?” Smiled Pamela like the gluttonous Snorlax she was, her squashed stomach giving an ominous and deep gurgle of hunger, even though she ate enough to feed a starving family for a week.

“You never told me you were a psychic, Pam!”
————————————————
As time went on with Pamela’s new job as a quality assurance tester and assistant manager of Henry’s Treats, the busty Nidoqueen ate more and more of the mom & pop shop’s tasty pastries, and with each baked sweet she grew both in height and width. Another month has gone by for the store, and business had continued to flop, while Henry’s most hardworking employee was to blame

The frame holding the door to Henry’s office practically exploded as Pamela, bigger, taller, and fatter than ever, wiggles herself inside.

“Guess who's ready to bust some moves!” said the gargantuan gal in glee as she waddled her way towards Henry’s workspace, her footfalls creating miniature earthquakes along the floor. The store was no longer able to stay in business due to her actions and the boss's encouragement, and the ancestral bakery had filed for bankruptcy not too long ago, not that Henry particularly cared. It was all for the best cause in the world.

Still, the Zoroark organized one last get together before the bank would come in the morning, and everyone was invited. Veronica, who stood like a wallflower in the corner drinking spiked punch, looked at Pamela at frowned. There was the Pokemon that put her out of a job, and she was getting a party for it as a reward.

The Nidoqueen was in a dress, a dress that may have fitted her when she first got here. Henry found it amusing, Veronica rolled her eyes. It was a gift from Arceus to the employees who brought their kids that her belly was so full of blubber, it did a fantastic job of keeping her as decent as possibly better than a panty ever could. She was, in fact, wearing panties, but they were essentially squiggly lines compared to her bare, astronomical ass. Her top could only reach to the Nidoqueen cavernous middle, whilst cleavage bulged from all sides.

The hefty Pamela giggled as she noticed the parents trying to cover their kid’s eyes. A Riolu with the word ‘Rolly’ squigged on his nametag was pointing at her, trying to get his dad’s attention. His dad just looked away, not wanting to deal with it.
1243211.title: Pamela meets up with the boss, Henry

choices: ...Klaus and her had begun a blossoming relationship.
12432113.content:
It had been a bit of a tough month for Rolly the Riolu.

Ironically, it started on his birthday, the big one-oh, and his father took him to the bakery he worked at to place a special cake order. After cracking open his Tepiggy Bank, he put in all of the money he had earned from doing chores and little odd jobs for the neighbors to buy a big of a cake he could afford. He was looking forward to the treat, and could hardly keep his excitement at school.

Than his father told him after school that he wouldn’t get it. To his credit, Rolly is a tough and brave boy who often spared others if he was feeling sad, but that day a few tears were shed. Instead, he split a cupcake a friend had given him at school with his dad that night. And as the month went on, things started to get worse. His dad, Klaus, started to receive less and less money from his job at the bakery, putting a strain on the single fathers finances.

And on the night Henry’s Treats went Bankrupt, a few tears were shed. But there was good news, he had another job offer coming up, and if all goes well he would be making even more money than he did before. So, to celebrate, Klaus to his son Rolly to his job’s one last party, a proper closing to a dark chapter in their lives. Of course, the Lucario in his optimism had completely forgotten about...her. So when Pamela waddled her fat ass into the office, he obviously didn’t want to deal with her, the reason why he’s being fired and who are his kid’s birthday cake.

“Daddy, who’s that chubby lady?” Rolly pointed out the gargantuan Nidoqueen In The middle of the room, shaking the floorboards as she danced.

Klaus, however, thoroughly did not want to deal with her at all, so he just mumbled something incoherent and walked away, motioning for Rolly to follow him. However, the Riolu didn’t. Instead, the small Pokémon crawled down from his seat and made his way to the middle of the office to deal with what his father would’nt.

“Hello!” Rolly greeted with a naive smile, speaking up so the Nidoqueen could hear him over the loud music. His teachers at school had been trying to get him to make new friends, and while his fellow peers may not be fruitful, maybe he should start with his dad’s freinds. “My name’s Rolly, Rolly the Riolu. What’s your name Miss my dad’s friend?”

Pamela came dangerously close to crushing the life out of the small Pokémon as she heavily fell her fat paw onto the floor as she danced, making Rolly lose his balance and fall on his hindquarters. He looked up to see the imposing figure of the Nidoqueen smiling cheerfully above him. “Nawww! Aren’t you just the cutest thing alive!” Without asking for permission, she grabbed him by his waist and hoisted his body up into the air to get a better look at him. “Why, your so sweet I could just eat you up!”

“O-oh...thank you ma’am!” Riolu nervously giggled, not sure if the voluptuous Nidoqueen was being serious or not. “I think you almost stomped on me earlier…”

“Well, my little coconut dream pie, at my size things around me tend to bend and break.” She booped the Little Riolu’s nose with a pudgy index finger. “And the smaller they are, the easier for me to crush them it is. And you, Rolly, are very, very small. Hmmm...why does that name sound familiar…” Pamela closed her eyes and thought hard while Rolly dangled in midair, completely at the whims of the bigger Pokémon.

“Oh, You must be Klaus’s kid!” Pamela lit up as she remembered who the Little Riolu in front of her was. “I ate your birthday cake!”

“Wha...what?” Rolly’s eyes widened at this revelation. “But...Dad said that it got nailed to someone else on accident.”

“Hmmm, nope! I definitely ate it up, and it was delicious!” Pamela licked her lips, remembering the taste of the blueberry icing and chocolate base. However, she made a small frown when she noticed Rolly beginning to tear up. “Hey, don’t be like that sugar plum. The cake isn’t gone, your looking at it right now!”

Rolly wiped his eyes with a free paw and tilted his head in confusion, not sure what the pudgy lady was saying. Pamela explained. “It all went right here, see?” Pamela directed the Riolu’s vision down to her bulging belly, shaking and quivering as the Nidoqueen shook it for emphasis. “Sorry you had to wait so long to get it, vanilla cupcake. Happy belated birthday~”

To his surprise, Rolly suddenly found himself squished up against the softest thing he ever felt as Pamela hugged the Riolu into her gut, as to get better acquainted with his birthday cake. Although confused at first, he eventually smiled and returned the embrace. It wasent as good as a birthday cake, but the Nidoqueen’s belly was more comfortable than any bed or couch.

“Oh! Silly me, I never gave you my name. How very rude of me.” Pamela finally relented her hug and set Rolly back on the floor, a little dazed from the lack of air. “My name is…”

“Pamela!” Klaus finally noticed that his son wasn't with him, and in fact was with his obese coworker. He rushed over to his son, thankful that he wasn’t hurt but no less protective. “Please try not to suffocate my son!”

“Oh Klaus, what perfect timing!” Pamela greeted, completely ignoring the hostility that was coming from him. “I was just about to ask you for a teeny favor. My landlord is kicking me out of my apartment since I spent all my money on food, so I need a place to crash at so I can get back on my paws. Henry said he would love to, but his wife wouldn’t like it. Veronica said something that I don’t think your banana muffin would like to hear. Soooo…”

Klaus’s jaw almost hit the floor at what Pamela was asking him. She, the cause of his financial troubles and why his son couldn’t have a cake on his birthday, was seriously asking him to stay at his place?! No, no no no no no nooooooo! But before he could evan tell her that, Rolly had piped up.

“Please, Dad?” Klaus looked down at his son, with a pleading look in his eyes. “Pamela said that since she ate my Birthday Cake, she is my Birthday Cake. It’ll be like mom is home again with three people living in the house, too. Pretty please with strawberry sprinkles on top?”

Now, Klaus was a lot of things. He was damned good pastry chef, a whiz at his taxes, and reportedly very satisfactory in the bedroom. But above all of that, he was a father who hated to see his son sad. So, against his better judgment and a million red flags going off in his brain…

“...alright.” Klaus sighed, rubbing his son’s ears. “But only for-“

“Yay!” Pamela grabbed Klaus by his shoulders, catching him by surprise, and brought him into a hug like she had given his son. Only this time, the recipient’s face was positioned into her heaving bosom than her belly, muffling sno sort of protest the Lucario made. “Daww, thanks Klaus, your really doing me a solid here! Why don’t we head back to your place and ditch this gig? I already raised the food table clean anyways.” The hefty Nidoqueen hoisted yo the Riolu into the air as well, finding himself perched on top of her shoulder.

With that, the newly formed trio were on their way home. And life for the father and son would soon pan out to be very Interesting. In the days that followed Pamela settling into her new home...

125.content:
Nothing suits your fancy up front, eh? Well, if we may, we can provide more candidates for your expanding pleasure...

First is Louise, a small and lithe Sylveon with a strong grasp on magic. She is something of a villain protagonist, using her magical talents for personal gain, typically revolving around monetary gain, ego stroking and petty revenge.

And second is Bertha, a stocky and muscular Lucario. She's a well-read, no-nonsense adventure archeologist, on a life-long mission to keep the world's history out of private interests' hands.

So, do either of these suit your fancy, or are they too off-beat?
125.title: Other female options

1252.content:
Ever since she was a little riolu pup, Bertha has been fascinated by the history of the world. All of the ruins of civilizations long gone were especially wondrous, and seeing them on screen always gave her a rush.

And so, Bertha took up the mantle of an archeologist, training and studying for all of her formative years. She was there when the Sinjoh Ruins were first discovered... and was there when the disaster happened.

Fifteen gunman in all, more than enough to overwhelm the digsite team. The ransacked the camp, stole the relics on site, and then rushed off, all while shooting Bertha in the shoulder for giggles. News reports mere weeks later connected dots between these assailants and millionaire Gus Holbrook, who used his vast wealth to avoid charges.

Whereas most would despair, Bertha only found drive. This righteous anger drove her to extend beyond her old ambitions; it wasn't enough to find the past. It was up to her to protect it. And so, Bertha would undergo rigorous training in moves, acrobatics and hand-to-hand combat. With these new skills and her portly frame, she'd be dubbed "The Wrecking Ball" by those inside her circle, and she has been able to stop many a theft ever since.

Of course, covering up the past is gonna uncover some weird stuff. How's she gonna expand?
1252.title: Bertha, Tomb-Raiding Wrecking Ball

12523.content: Don't want to settle for one or the other? Try both and keep Bertha balanced. Or maybe you'd like to make her pack on the pounds from something other than muscle.
12523.title: Other Options for Bertha

125232.content:
Bertha is notorious among both archeologists and criminals alike for her imposing size and girth. And indeed, her muscle alone gives her a clear difference in width against her peers, and she has the skill and strength to back up that scare factor.

But that's not the same as being fat, now is it? And we need to fix that and GOOD, the only question now is how!

Winter Weight
The mountain range just north of Unova is a cold, unforgiving environment. And Bertha is hiking right through them, hauling a stone idol away from potential thieves. She's about to freeze to death in an unceremonious manner, but she's hauled into an underground civilization before she has time to perish. Ground, rock, and ice types of all kinds inhabit an elaborate tunnel city, and they are especially generous to anyone who falls in. Bertha doesn't want to be long, but she can't help but feel drowsier and drowsier...

...and heavier and heavier.

Lazy Days
Things have been quiet for Bertha. No major discoveries have made headlines for a while, so she's had time to simply relax and get back into shape. As the "normal" days go by, however, she can't help but feel like something is wrong. Almost as if this is all staged, to make her complacent....

Not to mull over such things, though. Though she is starting to feel her belt tighten every day, no matter what her diet is...

Either of these suit your fancy?

1252332.title: Bertha: Muscle Growth

12523322.content:
Jump kick, dodge roll, and punch. Jump kick, dodge roll, and punch.

This was Bertha's training for the day. As of late, she's had to face goons carrying actual riot shields instead of random debris. This makes those goons especially hard to deal with up front, so she's had to develop maneuvers to dispatch them as fast as possible. This exercise was the latest, and most brutal; stagger them by kicking them right in the shield, roll around to the other side and, while they're still stunned, bop'em in the back of the head.

Sandy the punching bag had endured twenty of these combos and counting, grunting a small pumpf with every blow. He was swinging in a pendulum-like motion almost constantly, the magnets holding him to the ceiling being the only thing keeping him from flying across the training room which he called home.

Jump kick, dodge roll, and punch once again, with Bertha's breath becoming slightly more labored. She sighed with slight disappointment; she was running low on energy, so she'd have to do the finale now.

One last kick, one last roll, and the Bertha paused. She breathed in deep and closed her eyes, allowing herself to relax somewhat. Her dreads rose as she allowed her aura to flow through her, and she stiffened once again with a clench of her fists. On cue, her entire musculature began to visibly expand; what was once buried under a layer of fluff surged outward into mountains and ravines of taught flesh, and a chorus of cracks echoed throughout the room as they collided and released. In a flash, she was a good half wider than she was before, and with a powerful scream she thrust her fist straight into Sandy's side.

At this blow, his magnets could hold no longer. He was ripped right from his roots and soared across the floor, slamming right into the wall before slumping to the ground.

Bertha stood triumphant for a glorious five seconds... before collapsing into exhaustion as her body deflated back to normal. She could feel sweat caking her fur by the gallon, and every bone in her body was wracked with pain. It was clear that she could stand to lay off the poffins for a while.

But she couldn't mull on that thought for long, for she then heard a fast-paced knocking on the door. She would typically say to wait for her to get back on her feet, but these knocks gave an air of a rather serious situation.

"I'm... done! You can... come in...!" Bertha announced between each breath, her breathing falling back to normal but still panting somewhat.

The door beside her proceeded to swing wide open, and in the vacant frame stood...

-----

Professor Gretchen Lowes:
A short, shrimpy dunsparce madame who specializes in the history of Johto. She and Bertha met shortly after her vow of justice, and they proved to be quite efficient partners ever since. This time around, she seems especially freaked out...


Lazlo Blaze, Superstar Martial Artist:
A scrappy, energetic and slightly immature infernape, self-proclaimed to be Bertha's "brother in arms". The two met up during a pirate raid on a research cruise, and he's always seeking exucses to tag along so that he can punch people and/or dump hot tar on their heads. He has his hands behind his back, and isn't even trying to hide the grin on his face...
12523322.title: One with Aura

choices: While showering, Bertha's muscles starts cramping...
In an attempt to help her body adapt, she tries expanding it gradually.
Nothing beats old fashioned weight training!
125233222.content:
"Howdy partner!"

In walked a tall, lightly muscled Infernape. Judging by how he grinned and held his hands behind his back, Bertha could only assume he had some good news to share. Still too winded to talk much, she said nothing as he bent down and offered her a gym towel and a bottle of water.

"Thanks," she said through ragged breath, shifting to a kneeling position and taking each item in hand. She winced. Even basic movement made her arms scream in pain.

The Infernape's grin faltered a bit. "Had a feeling you'd be done with your training right about now, so I figured I'd bring you a little something," he said, standing up.

Bertha bit off the bottle cap and chugged half of the water in one go. Ahh, refreshment. Everything hurt like hell, but at least her thirst was quenched. "Your timing's getting better Lazlo," she said.

"Thanks." Lazlo stood up. "Um, I'd ask if you'd like any help getting up, buuut..."

"Too much pain."

"Thought so." He strolled over to Sandy, hands clasped behind his back. Bertha heard him mutter, "Ooh, that musta hurt..."

"It's just a punching bag. It can't feel pain," she said. Her breathing was a little more even now.

"Yeah, but poor ol' Sandy's gonna retire early at the rate you're going." Lazlo seemed to take notice of something, judging by how he leaned closer. A tear, perhaps. "Or die."

Bertha had to scoff at that. "No wonder you never show raiders any mercy; you spend it all on inanimate objects."

"Hey, they're evil. They deserve it." Lazlo raised his hands in defense. "'Sides, I save some for you too."

"And I appreciate that." Bertha stood up slowly. Ow, ow. Stop hurting, legs. Ow.

She must have made quite the pained expression, as Lazlo frowned and asked, "You sure you're good to move?"

"It's fine," Bertha grunted. The pain was fading, but...

"Doesn't look fine." Lazlo sighed. "Look--"

"I'm not learning Bulk Up."

He flinched but was otherwise unfazed. "Oh c'mon, a smaller boost has to be worth not hurting yourself!"

"Bulk-Up causes strain too."

"Not as much!"

Bertha sighed. She looked at the towel in hand for a moment, then dried her head and neck. How many times would she have to say no before he finally listened? Yes, rapid body expansion took its toll, but she needed some kind of secret weapon. Now more than ever.

The silence continued as Lazlo set Sandy back up on the cable. Bertha dried the rest of herself off. At least, she dried what she could. Ugh. Well, she planned on showering anyway. She moved to leave.

"Wait, wait!"

She stopped, turned to Lazlo. "What?"

His expression brightened. "I got approval to join you on the expedition!"

"Oh?"

"Yup!" He grinned from ear to ear. The flame on his head flared up a bit. "We're gonna kick some serious ass together!"

Bertha couldn't help but smirk at his enthusiasm. Still a kid at heart, this one. "You'll be doing most of that. They need me to help with the excavation."

Then again, if they were bringing Lazlo then there was a strong chance the team was in for quite the raid. Possibly even multiple raids. Either way, she'd be getting her fair share of the action. And depending on how many goons attacked at once...

Well, what she lacked in mobility she made up for endurance.

"I'm going to go shower," she said.

"Cool. I'ma get some training in." Lazlo assumed a boxing stance and started pummeling Sandy with a rapid flurry of punches.

Bertha shook her head. Quick to the punch, quick to change moods... Did he ever slow down?

A smell caught her attention. She sniffed an armpit and cringed. Right, better do something about that.
125233222.title: Enter Lazlo

info.brief_description: A quality controlled spiritual successor to an old interactive.
info.description:
At one point, there was an interactive on this site about anthropomorphic Pokémon undergoing various forms of expansion. Said interactive and its creator have been gone for some time, so I decided to revitalize the concept in my own way.

The setting is an alternate universe of the Pokémon world: humans are replaced with anthro 'Mons, while normal animals take the place of the regular 'Mons. (It raises some potential ethical questions, I know, but it's better than having the anthros eat meat from feral versions of themselves.)

Battles are about the same, minus Trainers. The league basically works like in the anime. Gyms too, though they also double as workout gyms.

Beyond that, it's pretty much the same world; same geography, same towns and cities, same habitats... You get the picture.

And now for the guidelines.

As stated in the short description, this interactive will be quality controlled. This means I'll be keeping a close eye on things to make sure this interactive doesn't get bogged down with low quality additions and excessive choice chapters.

So what am I looking for in additions? Well...

--The format works like this: pick your character, then your type of expansion, and then the cause of said expansion. After that, get straight to the story. Any additional setup should be within the story itself.
--Once the story's started, try to avoid chapters that only exist to provide choices. I'll allow some leeway if several choices are introduced within the narrative and you don't have enough room to put all the options in a single addition. Ideally, though, I'd like to keep these situations to a minimum.
--Okay. Writing quality. This is the big one. I won't demand absolute perfection, but I will ask for a considerable amount of effort. You won't need to cut it close with the character limit in every addition, but you will need to write more than one or two short paragraphs. These may be fetish stories, but they're still stories. They need sufficient content if they're gonna be any good.
--And no, writing a whole bunch of small chapters will not compensate for a lack of content in each individual chapter. Quantity is not an acceptable substitute for quality.
--No sloppiness with the spelling, grammar, or formatting. Double-check your work, and use paragraph breaks.
--Seriously, I can't stress paragraph breaks enough.
--EDIT 07/04/2020: I'm sorry for not making this part explicit, but I reserve the right to delete any additions that I do not consider up to standard. I'm not just blowing smoke when I say this is quality controlled. If you're not sure of your addition's quality, please have a proofreader double check it first.

As for the actual story content...

--I'll allow multiple types of expansion to occur within the same story. Just make sure there's an option to pass on it. No forcing additional fetishes on the reader, in other words.
--Expansion can be undone if desired, but again, no forcing it on the reader.
--Motives for and/or causes of expansion are allowed to change within the framework of the story. (e.g., accidental weight gain becomes willing, willing breast expansion becomes unwilling, etc)
--All characters that undergo expansion and/or take part in sexual activities must be at least 18 years old.
--As a result, pedophilia's pretty much off the table.
--Scat and watersports are also forbidden.
--Dark subject matter like rape and abuse are allowed to be explored within the story. Just... Handle with care, okay? It's touchy stuff. Leave content warnings, just to be safe.
--On a lighter note, same-sex relationships are A-OK! And yes, that applies to both males and females.

And that should do it. I realize I'm asking a lot, but don't think this means I'm demanding absolute perfection! I'm still just a novice myself, after all. Just try your best and have fun!

Oh, P.S. If you want to discuss something concerning the interactive, feel free to hit me up!
